name: Theseus and the Minotaur?
description:
A simple 3-level UI-driven remake of the classic puzzle game "Theseus and the Minotaur".

Embody a no-poly Theseus and escape from a fast, yet stupid, Minotaur through all the levels of its maze!

  • Use WASD or arrow keys for movement.
  • R to restart the game
  • Esc to exit
